main event: On 21 September 1957, a sighting of an unidentified flying object was reported in the Panama Canal Zone, suggested to be a balloon or other aerial phenomena.
interesting points: The object was described as having a luminous light over a mile wide,The sighting occurred at 2240K with two CIC officers observing it,The object was noted to hover and emit a fluorescent white glow,Radar operators at Fort Clayton tracked the object and reported its tremendous speed,The report deemed the observer as a reliable source.
witness description: CIC officers and radar operators at Fort Clayton
